### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title: Inmate Purchasing Plan
#### Reference Number: CB-113-62180206

#### Original Publication Date: June 28, 2024
#### New Tender Closing Date: December 31, 2100, 13:00:00

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is issuing a Notice to Advise Interested Suppliers that it intends to establish a business account agreement with an e-commerce provider for the provision of inmate personal property within CSC’s institutions.

#### Goods and Services Description
The CSC is seeking to provide its inmates with a list of pre-approved goods and services, including electronics, clothing, footwear, and other essential items. The e-commerce provider must operate a centralized free business account, which allows authorized CSC personnel to order approved items via an e-commerce platform. The platform must include features such as browsing and transactions by authorized users only.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The CSC will evaluate statements of capabilities submitted by interested suppliers based on the following criteria:

* Five-year operating history of an e-commerce business, including a centralized business account and payment by credit card;
* Ability to provide shipping and delivery to all CSC institutions listed in Attachment 2;
* Demonstrated quality assurance (QA) process and returns or replacement processes;
* Existence of an order management and tracking system;
* Ability to generate various reports, including monthly sales transactions, inventory reports, and sales reports.

#### Unrestricted Tendering
The tendering process will be open to all qualified suppliers. Interested suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities by December 31, 2100.

#### Contact Details
Suppliers interested in submitting a statement of capabilities should contact Stéphanie Gigoux, Contracting Officer, at:
340 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON K1A 0P9
Email: [Stephanie.Gigoux@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Stephanie.Gigoux@csc-scc.gc.ca)
